name: Cabin Simulator
description:
For the FilmJam gamejame 2022, I decided to create a Cabin  Simulator where you as player can use a monster to please spectators. 

The concept is inspired by the movie Cabin in the woods. I initially had tons of ideas such as multiple distractions/traps as tropes, unlockable monsters (horror clowns, masked men, little ghostly girls etc)  each with their own abilities, pros and cons. 

Multiple cabin locations etc. 

Unfortunately, time was not on my side. I may further explore this prototype in the future. Until then, this is just  that.. a buggy messy prototype :).

Assets by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)
